snippet.title: Gigantic - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Gigantic has officially launched on Steam, Arc, Xbox One, and Windows 10! Experience a strategic hero shooter unlike any you've seen in the past with truly innovative mechanics for casual and seasoned players alike. Featuring deeply strategic 5V5 battles, prepare to fight alongside and against massive guardians across vibrant arenas where you must adapt to every situation to walk away victorious.

Our official launch includes the new hero Ramsay, a cunning melee fighter brandishing a lethal blade. See how he fares against a roster of diverse heroes fit for any playstyle.

Gigantic is free to play across all platforms! Think Fast. Be Bold. Go Gigantic.

Learn more: http://www.gogigantic.com
Like: https://www.facebook.com/GoGigantic
Follow: https://twitter.com/GoGigantic
Watch: http://www.twitch.tv/gogigantic
